title: bhakthiyinaalE
sahitya:
bhaktiyinAlE (nalla) (deiva) inda pArinil EidiDum mEnmaigaL
 kELaDi cittam teLiyum ingu sheigai anaittilum shemmai pirandiDum


anupallavi

 viddaigaL shErum nalla vIrar uravu kiDaikkum manattiDai
 tattuvam uNDAm nenjil sancalam nIngi urudi vinaindiDum


caraNam 1

 kAmap-pishAshai kudikkAl koNDaDittu vizhuttiDa enrum it-
tAmasa pEyaik-kaNDu tAkki maDittiDalAgum ennEramum
 tImaiyai eNNi anjun-tEmparp-pishAshai t-tirugi erindu poin-
nAmamillAdE uNmai nAmattinAl ingu nanmai viLaindiDum



2

 Ashaiyaik-kolvOm pulai accakattaik-konru poshukkiDuvOm keTTa
pAshamaruppOm ingup-pArvati shakti viLangudal kaNDadai
mOsham sheyyAmal uNmai muTrilum kaNDu vaNangi vaNangiyOr
Ishanaip-pOTri inbam yAvaiyum uNDu pugazh koNDu vAzhguvam



3

 shOrvugaL pOghum poi sukhattinait-taLLi sukham peralAgum nar-
pArvaigaL tOnrum miDippAmbu kaDitta viSam aghanrE nalla
sErvaigaL shErum pala shelvangaL vandu magizhcci viLaindiDum
tIrvaigaL tIrum piNi tIrum pala pala inbangaL sherndiDum



4

 kalvi vaLarum pala kAryam kaiyurum vIriyam OngiDum
alla mozhiyum nalla Anmai uNDAgum arivu teLindiDum
sholluvadellAm marai shollinaip-pOlap-payanuLadAgum mei
vallamai tOnrum deiva vAzhkkaiyTrEyingu vAzhttiDalAm uNmai



5

 shOmba vazhiyum uDal shonna paDikku naDakkum muDi shaTrum
kUmbudalinri nalla gOpuram pOla nimirnda nilai perum
vImbugaL pOgum nalla mEnmaiyuNDAgi bhuyangaL parukkum poip-
pAmbu maDiyum meip-param venru nalla nerigaL unDAi viDum



6

 santati vAzhum verum sancalam kETTu valimaigaL shErndiDum
inda bhuvikkE ingOr Ishan uNDAyin arikkayiTTEn unran
kanda malar tAL tuNai kAdal maghavu vaLarttiDa vENdum en
cintaiyarindE aruL sheidiDa enrAl aruLeidiDum
